Class DbHumans

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DbHumans
extends DbAbstract
    The Class used to update or retrieve information from the humans tables in the database.

                               java.lang.String comCompany)
        Insert human into the database.
        Parameters:
        aCtHuman - The CtHuman of which to use the information to insert into the database
        comCompany - The communication company that is associated with the human

      • getHuman

        public static CtHuman getHuman(java.lang.String phone)
        Gets a human details from the database, using the phone number to retrieve the data.
        Parameters:
        phone - The phone number to use to get the data from the database
        Returns:
        The human data that is retrieved from the database. This could be empty

      • getSystemHumans

        public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,CtHuman> getSystemHumans()
        Gets all humans from the database.
        Returns:
        A hashtable of the humans using their phone number as a key value

      • getAssCtHumanActComCompany

        public static java.util.Hashtable<CtHuman,ActComCompany> getAssCtHumanActComCompany(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ActComCompany> htActComCompany)
        Gets the associated humans and their communication company.
        Parameters:
        htActComCompany - the ht act com company
        Returns:
        Hashtable of the humans and their associated communicaiton company. The human is used as the key value

      • deleteHuman

        public static void deleteHuman(CtHuman aCtHuman)
        Deletes a human from the database.
        Parameters:
